newsitem.title: USA: InterDigital terminates Webb as CEO.
newsitem.headline: InterDigital terminates Webb as CEO.

text.p: InterDigital Communications Corp has terminated Gregory Webb's employment as chief executive officer, a spokeswoman said Thursday.
"There was an agreement reached between both parties that the relationship was not working out," she said, adding that Webb was leaving the company.
The spokeswoman said InterDigital would not look for anyone to replace Webb as chief executive, leaving William Doyle, its president, in charge.
Webb had been chief executive since October 1996.
InterDigital makes wireless telecommunications systems like local loop systems.
